{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19907v1", "title": "Vanishing of higher cohomology and cohomological rationality", "summary": "Our work begins by studying the vanishing of higher cohomology for the
derived pushforward of a torsion free sheaf along a modification of integral
Noetherian schemes. Leveraging this, we establish a relatively simple recipe
for constructing varieties with (mild) rational or Du Bois singularities, some
of which is applicable in both zero and nonzero characteristic. Furthermore, we
explore notions of singularities that lie in the same cohomological veins of
rational singularities for varieties in characteristic zero, including Bhatt's
derived splinters and Kov\'{a}cs' birational derived splinters.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG,math.AC", "published": "2025-04-28T15:40:09Z"}
